metadata.title: CVE-2023-36746 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in thefstReaderIterBlocks2 fstWritex len functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. Aspecially crafted .fst file can lead to memory corruption. A victim wouldneed to open a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.Thisvulnerability concerns the handling of `len` in `fstWritex` when parsingthe time table.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
